descriptionHtml:
[size=\"5\"][CENTER][b]Dragonplate Helmet Retexture[/b][/size] by Wyrm[/CENTER]

[CENTER][IMG]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/2708-1-1323079838.jpg[/IMG][/CENTER]

[b]Description:[/b]
Changed the bone´s color for a bleached bone colour, and added one, two or none tribal lines in the eyes.

[b]Updates:[/b]
**Update 1.2 Added a new version without red lines
**Update 1.3 Added a new version with only one red line in the left eye

[b]Install:[/b]
Extract the file and copy the /Data directory into your game´s directory, or copy the /textures directory into your Game´s data directory

[b]Desinstall:[/b]
Delete the File /Data/Armour/Dragonbone/dragonbonehelmet.dds



[CENTER][b]Please, if you like it, endorse me :-P, Thanks![/b][/CENTER]
author: Wyrm1331
